title: OPO Market Coordinator - Indianapolis - Sports Equipment
text: Posted/Updated: 10-05-2015 Brief Job Description: Assists Manager in development of Outdoor Programs and Outreach Market Plan in alignment with national plan. Coordinates scheduling and execution of Outdoor Programs and Outreach Market Plan. Leads and coordinates Local Social Media
